name: Game - YOMI
description: Our project, Yomi: Our game takes place in the old Edo era in Japan, when after many wars took place, even the blood of the gods was spilled. As the ashes and blood of many gathered in the depths of Yomi, the japanese underworld, our protagonist was reborn.  Enter the gloomy world of the undead, filled with mythological characters and a mysterious figure that guides you to the exit of such world. Unravel the truth and escape from this nightmare, for only you, are capable of doing so.
